page.title: 04LOCAL CONCERNS,ELMLEY CASTLE
page.content: Concern at lack of local government spending reducing services.Grass verges not cut regularly.Snow clearance not always satisfactory. Education expenditure is low in this county on the national scale.Many object to the architecture and number of new houses being granted planning permission,fearing disruption of picturesque quiet of the villages. Conservationists are concerned about threats to wild life and habitat by stubble burning and increased cultivation of lower slopes of hill. Inhabitants object to the intrusion of low flying military aircraft and the increasing amount of radar equipment on the hill.
